program: Master of Human Kinetics - Sport Management
notes: Disclaimer: In the event of a discrepancy between this course sequence and the official calendars, the calendars take precedence and are considered the authoritative source.
APA 5916 could potentially be taken during the winter term with the approval of the internship coordinator.
Optional courses may be taken in any term, if offered, and with the approval of the graduate program director. The optional courses listed below are recommended:
APA 5104 Sport and Physical Activity in Canadian Life
APA 5305 Policy Analysis of Sport and Physical Activity in Canada
APA 5306 Ethics and Values in Sport and Physical Activity
APA 5307 Legal Issues and Risk Management in Sport
APA 5997 Directed Studies in Sport, Physical Activity and Health
APA 6302 Qualitative Research Methods in Sport, Physical Activity and Health
APA 6110 Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Management

courses: APA5105 | Organizational Theory in Sport and Physical Activity
APA5303 | Marketing and Sponsorship of Sport and Physical Activity
APA5308 | Organizational Behaviour in Sport and Physical Activity
APA5318 | Financial Management of Sport and Physical Activity
APA5916 | Internship in Administration of Sport and Physical Activity
APA5921 | Critical Analysis and Reflection on Theory and Practice in Sport Management
